==Useful Info==
'''Demonspawn''' are fairly ordinary humanoid monsters. They can appear in a [[Pandemonium]]-themed [[Orcish Mines]] [[vault]], inside [[Wucad Mu's Monastery]], and very rarely in the [[Dungeon]].

==Tips & Tricks==
Like all demonspawn, they are vulnerable to holy weapons and [[silver]], so use those if you have them. If you see them outside of a vault (and outside [[Pandemonium]]), then they are most likely [[shapeshifter (monster)|shapeshifter]]s.

==History==
*In [[0.28]], regular demonspawn were buffed significantly and now appear in various vaults. They replace the "base" (occupationless) demonspawn that were removed in this version.
*In [[0.14]], a new set of [[List_of_demonspawn|demonspawn monsters]] were introduced to [[Pandemonium]].
